Address.Address2: AD200, Pas De La Casa, Andorra

ShortDescriptions.ShortDescription: Of particular note are the panoramic views of the ski slopes, of the valley and of the mountain. The following credits cards are accepted Visa, Euro/Mastercard and Master. Among the offers from the kitchen you will find Refrigerator, Microwave, Table/Chairs, Freezer, Toaster, Crockery and Coffee Machine Guests can rent a car from the hotel. Facilities include Heating.

The apartments have Independent Heating, TV, Pay-to-view TV , Lounge-Diner, Kitchen, American Kitchen, Coffee Machine, Refrigerator, Freezer, Microwave, Crockery, Table/Chairs, Hairdryer, Towels, Sheets and Blankets , and among our services and facilities available we have Lifts, Discotheque, Heating, Cot, Billiards and Bar Cafeteria . We also have Multilingual Personnel, Currency Exchange, Ski Room, Vehicle Rental, Tourist Information, Shops and Porter¿s Lodge. Credit Cards: Visa, ...
